title: Executive Order-Amendment of Civil Service Rules
content: Special Departmental Rule No. 1, clause 3, is hereby amended by adding to the places excepted from examination in the Department of the Interior the following:
In the Bureau of Education: Specialist in foreign educational systems and specialist in education as a preventive of pauperism and crime.
citation: Grover Cleveland, Executive Order-Amendment of Civil Service Rules Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/206532
